attributes.action: Stop immigration until unemployment level falls to 2%
attributes.additional_details:
The government states that it has a high priority in getting people off Welfare and back into work.

There are about two and a half million unemployed in the country and also about two and a half million migrants.

The average unemployment rate is about 10%, higher in some regions.

I suggest that migration should be suspended until our unemployment rate falls to 2%.

You can only get people off Welfare if there are jobs to go to.
